snippet: According to the suit, the city’s Department of Finance put some older New Yorkers in danger of eviction by improperly altering deadlines for the rent program and by failing to properly inform them of the rule.
abstract: Suit filed by New York City Public Advocate Letitia James and tenant lawyers accuses city's Finance Dept of quietly purging poor people from rolls of seniors who are eligible for rent freezes; accuses department of altering deadlines for rent program and then rejecting tenants who were unaware of change; suit targets flaws in program that has been cited as key achievement by Mayor Bill de Blasio.
lead_paragraph: According to the suit, the city’s Department of Finance put some older New Yorkers in danger of eviction by improperly altering deadlines for the rent program and by failing to properly inform them of the rule.

headline.main: New York City Is Sued Over Rule Change to Rent-Freeze Program
headline.print_headline: City Is Sued Over Rule Change to Rent-Freeze Program
